actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the modification of the project for flood protection on the Charitan River, Iowa and Missouri, in order to provide for a Federal payment toward the cost of construction of a fish hatchery.

summary.text: Authorizes the modification of the project for flood protection on the Chariton River, Iowa and Missouri, in order to provide for a Federal payment of $700,000 toward the cost of construction of a fish hatchery by the Iowa Conservation Commission.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the modification of the project for flood protection on the Charitan River, Iowa and Missouri, in order to provide for a Federal payment toward the cost of construction of a fish hatchery.
